text: The 2017 African Badminton Championships or All Africa Championships were held in Benoni, South Africa between 16-23 April, organised by the Badminton Confederation of Africa. At the team event, Egypt won the gold medal after beat South Africa with the score 3-1. Nigeria and Zambia settle for the bronze medal after reach the semi final round. ==Medalists== {| |- |rowspan=2|Men's singles |rowspan=2| Adel Hamek |rowspan=2| Ahmed Salah | Georges Julien Paul |- |
